about.details:
Shubhshree Biofuels Energy Limited was established in 2013 and supplies biomass fuels, including biomass pellets and briquettes, to customers operating in the recycled material, textile processing, pharmaceutical, metal, etc. sectors.

The company has installed three briquetting and pelleting machines, one of which is owned by the company and the other two have been leased together with the premises, which have a combined capacity of 132 tonnes per day. In the period from October 2023 to February 2024, the company produced 12090 tonnes of biomass fuels, while the total sales volume was approximately 50600 tonnes and the share of manufactured goods accounted for approximately 23.8% of the total sales volume.

The company's customers are mainly from the northern states of India, especially Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, and the NCR region.

As at March 30, 2024, the company employed 26 people.

faqs.question: What is the Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO is a SME IPO of 1392000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.56 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹119 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on September 9, 2024, and closes on September 11, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO opens on September 9, 2024 and closes on September 11, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO?
faqs.answer: Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,42,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO will be done on Thursday, September 12, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, September 13, 2024. Check the Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shubhshree Biofuels Energy IPO listing date is on Monday, September 16, 2024.
